definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Sargon (As. Šargânu, and (prob. by pop, etymol.) Šarrukênu = firm, faithful, king v. reff. infr.);—King of Assyria B.C. 722–705, conqueror of Samaria, father of Sennacherib, only Is 20:1 (LXX Arna, Aq Theod Saraḡω, Symm Sargwn [Q:mg]); Ptol:Canon ’ Arkea/nou (genit.); cf. Schr:COT ad loc. Tiele:Gesch. 238 ff.
